title: How many numbers in corresponding line?

data.title: How many numbers in corresponding line?
data.stubGenerator:
read N:int
loop N read row:string(512)

write 0
data.inputDescription:
<<First line>> :  [[N]] number of lines to read
[[N]] << Next lines >> :  List of [[K]] integers
data.outputDescription: <<Number>> of numbers on the correct line.

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

Count all the numbers equal to their line number.
The first line number is 0.

Example 1 :
If input is
1
0 1 2 3 4

Output is 1 because only one 0 is on line 0

Example 2 :
If input is
2
0 1 2 3 4
1 1 2 3 4

Output is 3 because only one 0 is on line 0 and there are two 1s in line 1 so 1 + 2 = 3
Input
First line : N number of lines to read
N Next lines : List of K integers
Output
Number of numbers on the correct line.
Constraints
1 ≤ N ≤ 50
1 ≤ K ≤ 50
Example
Input
1
0
Output
1
